mapper.select: /*合同非废弃、单据类别为融资租赁合同*/ select COUNT(1) from FM_ConAcc a where isnull(a.FIsDrop,0)!=1 and a.FDocCate = '101'

select sum((cast(a.Fnum as int) * a.FMYHKE + a.FFee)) + 1767172084 'sum' from FinLease_Contract a join FM_ConAcc b on a.FContractID = b.ID where isnull(b.FIsDrop,0)!= 1 and isnull(a.WFState,0) != 3 and YEAR(b.FContractTime) >= 2017;
select COUNT(1) from FM_ConAcc a where isnull(a.FIsDrop,0)!=1 and a.FDocCate = '101' and year(a.FContractTime) > 2017

select sum((cast(a.Fnum as int) * a.FMYHKE + a.FFee)) 'sum' from FinLease_Contract a join FM_ConAcc b on a.FContractID = b.ID where isnull(b.FIsDrop,0)!= 1 and isnull(a.WFState,0) != 3 and YEAR(b.FContractTime) >= 2018;

select distinct left(y.FName,2) 'area' from FinLease_Contract a join FM_ConAcc b on a.FContractID = b.ID join Fcar f on a.FCar = f.ID left join Area y on y.ID = f.FArea where a.FContract in ( select a.FContract from ( select a.FContract,ROW_NUMBER() over(order by b.FContractTime desc) rw from FinLease_Contract a join FM_ConAcc b on a.FContractID = b.ID where isnull(b.FIsDrop,0)!= 1 and isnull(a.WFState,0) != 3 and YEAR(b.FContractTime) >= '2018' and a.FAgentDep != '593' ) a where a.rw < 11 )
select top 5 a.FBrand 'name' ,COUNT(1) 'value' from Fcar a where a.FUseStatus = 1 and a.FCarPreStatus != '138' group by a.FBrand order by COUNT(1) desc

/*品牌英雄榜TOP5*/ select top 5 f.FBrand 'name' ,COUNT(1) 'value' from FinLease_Contract a join FM_ConAcc b on a.FContractID = b.ID join Fcar f on a.FCar = f.ID where isnull(b.FIsDrop,0)!= 1 and isnull(a.WFState,0) != 3 and YEAR(b.FContractTime) >= 2017 group by f.FBrand order by COUNT(1) desc

select case when year(a.FBirthday) >= 2000 then '00后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1990 then '90后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1980 then '80后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1970 then '70后' end 'name' ,count(1) 'value' from T_BD_Person a --人员表 left join T_ORG_PositionMember c on c.FPersonID = a.fid --人员岗位对应表 left join T_ORG_Position d on c.FPositionID = d.FID --岗位表 left join T_HR_JobLevel h on d.FJobLevelID = h.fID --职层表 left join T_HR_PERSONPOSITION j on j.fpersonid = a.fid --入离职日期表 left join T_ORG_Admin k on k.fid = d.FAdminOrgUnitID --架构表 /*在职*/ where j.fleftdate is null /*融资租赁事业部--营销部*/ and k.FDisplayName_L2 like '%喜相逢_股东大会_总裁_常务副总裁_融资性租赁事业部%' group by case when year(a.FBirthday) >= 2000 then '00后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1990 then '90后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1980 then '80后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1970 then '70后' end

/*排除营销部、风控*/ select case when year(a.FBirthday) >= 2000 then '00后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1990 then '90后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1980 then '80后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1970 then '70后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1960 then '60后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1950 then '50后' else '' end 'name' ,count(1) 'value' from T_BD_Person a --人员表 left join T_ORG_PositionMember c on c.FPersonID = a.fid --人员岗位对应表 left join T_ORG_Position d on c.FPositionID = d.FID --岗位表 left join T_HR_JobLevel h on d.FJobLevelID = h.fID --职层表 left join T_HR_PERSONPOSITION j on j.fpersonid = a.fid --入离职日期表 left join T_ORG_Admin k on k.fid = d.FAdminOrgUnitID --架构表 /*在职*/ where j.fleftdate is null /*融资租赁事业部--营销部*/ and k.FDisplayName_L2 not like '%喜相逢_股东大会_总裁_常务副总裁_融资性租赁事业部%' and k.FDisplayName_L2 not like '%喜相逢_股东大会_总裁_常务副总裁_福建喜盾资产管理有限公司%' and a.FBirthday is not null group by case when year(a.FBirthday) >= 2000 then '00后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1990 then '90后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1980 then '80后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1970 then '70后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1960 then '60后' when year(a.FBirthday) >= 1950 then '50后' else '' end
